attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whether it is the child benefit data loss, policies regarding Europe, Northern Rock, detention without charge, drugs, rights of test tube babies, CO2 reductions, renewable energy, traffic congestion, affordable housing, immigration, value for money health services, foreign policy, or whatever, there is enough of grave concern at the moment that the country should be given the opportunity to confirm or reject the mandate of the current government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
